item.title: 穆迪称沙特阿拉伯主要项目进展 "不平衡
item.description: 据穆迪投资者服务公司（Moody's Investors Service）称，由于工程限制、私人投资不足和油价下跌等挑战，沙特阿拉伯在其最雄心勃勃的基础设施项目上进展 "不平衡"。【原文：Saudi Arabia is making “uneven” progress on its most ambitious infrastructure projects due to challenges including engineering constraints, a shortfall in private investment and lower oil prices, according to Moody’s Investors Service.】

item.title: 投资者押注特朗普团队的下一个投资目标
item.description: 首先是斥资 4 亿美元入股 MP Materials 公司，这是一家鲜为人知的稀土材料开采商。接着，斥资 100 亿美元入股陷入困境的芯片制造商英特尔公司（Intel Corp.然后又入股了希望在美国生产锂的 Lithium Americas Corp.【原文：First it was a $400-million stake in MP Materials Corp., a little-known miner of rare-earth materials. Next, a $10 billion investment in embattled chipmaker Intel Corp. Then another slug of shares in Lithium Americas Corp., which has aspirations of producing lithium in the US.】

item.title: 沙特 PIF 和 Engie 是投身绿色债务热潮的借款人之一
item.description: 从沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金到法国能源公司 Engie SA，借款人都在转向欧洲寻求绿色资金，因为欧洲市场迎来了近 18 个月来最繁忙的时期。【原文：Borrowers from Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund to French energy firm Engie SA are turning to Europe for green funding as the market enjoys its busiest spell in nearly 18 months.】

item.title: 化工巨头英力士因进口产品冲击而裁员
item.description: 由于高昂的能源成本和来自中国的廉价进口产品，化工巨头英力士集团（Ineos Group）将在英国赫尔市的一家工厂裁员 60 人，裁员比例约为员工总数的 20%。【原文：Chemicals giant Ineos Group is cutting 60 jobs — about 20% of the workforce — at a plant in Hull, England due to high energy costs and cheap imports from China.】

item.title: 贝莱德称欧洲是其 "最有吸引力 "的信贷投资地之一
item.description: 贝莱德公司称，欧洲公司债券是全球信贷中最引人注目的机会之一，接近 3% 的收益率提供了难得的相对安全的收入来源。【原文：BlackRock Inc. says European corporate bonds stand out as one of the most compelling opportunities in global credit, with yields near 3% offering a rare source of relatively safe income.】

item.title: 凯雷公布专有数据显示美国就业疲软
item.description: 凯雷投资集团（Carlyle Group）是一家投资管理公司，其投资的公司在全球雇用了 70 多万名员工，该集团正在填补美国政府停摆留下的经济数据空白，对劳动力市场进行了严峻的解读。【原文：Carlyle Group, the investment manager whose portfolio companies employ more than 700,000 people globally, is stepping into the economic data void left by the US government shutdown with a grim read on the labor market.】

item.title: 法国风险再现，欧元看涨势头出现裂痕
item.description: 随着法国政治不确定性的加剧，投资者降低了欧元的上行风险。【原文：The euro is showing early signs of strain, with investors paring upside exposure as political uncertainty spikes in France.】

item.title: 前新加坡政府投资公司首席信息官称：如果风险资产暴跌，美联储可能采取量化宽松政策
item.description: 新加坡财富基金前投资总监表示，如果股票等风险资产暴跌，美国联邦储备委员会很可能会采取量化宽松政策。【原文：The US Federal Reserve is likely to resort to quantitative easing if there is a crash in risk assets such as equities, said the former investment chief of Singapore’s wealth fund.】

item.title: 泰国企业因降息和政治稳定而出售更多债券
item.description: 泰国债券市场协会（Thai Bond Market Association）称，在借贷成本压力减轻和政治稳定性提高的情况下，泰国企业本月将加大债券销售力度以筹集资金。【原文：Thai companies are set to ramp up bond sales this month to raise funds amid easing pressure on borrowing costs and improved political stability, according to the Thai Bond Market Association.】

item.title: 沙特财富基金在推动借贷之际出售首笔欧元债券
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的主权财富基金正在市场上发行其首笔欧元债券，扩大了沙特王国为其经济转型计划提供资金的债务推动力。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund is in the market with its first euro-denominated bond, extending the kingdom’s debt push to finance its economic transformation plans.】

item.title: 瑞银计划与 10 亿美元企业贷款相关的 SRT 交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）正在就一项与企业贷款投资组合相关的潜在重大风险转移向投资者征求意见，因为这家瑞士银行正在探索如何降低其主要监管机构提出的严格资本要求。【原文：UBS Group AG is sounding out investors for a potential significant risk transfer tied to a portfolio of corporate loans, according to people familiar with the matter, as the Swiss bank explores ways to mitigate strict capital requirements being imposed by its main regulator.】

item.title: 中国贷款货币互换后，肯尼亚获得 2.15 亿美元节余
item.description: 肯尼亚财政部长约翰-姆巴迪（John Mbadi）表示，肯尼亚已成功地将中国铁路贷款的货币兑换成人民币，预计这将为肯尼亚每年节省 2.15 亿美元的偿债成本。【原文：Kenya has successfully converted the currency for railway loans from China into yuan, which it expects will save it $215 million annually in debt servicing costs, according to Treasury Secretary John Mbadi.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德支持的 Clean Max 计划于 11 月首次公开募股 5.86 亿美元
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，由布鲁克菲尔德支持的 Clean Max Enviro Energy Solutions Ltd. 计划最早于 11 月启动 520 亿卢比（约合 5.86 亿美元）的首次公开募股。【原文：Brookfield-backed Clean Max Enviro Energy Solutions Ltd. is planning to launch its 52 billion rupees ($586 million) initial public offering as early as November, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧尔班内阁推动匈牙利降息要求后福林下挫
item.description: 匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）领导的政府向央行施压，要求央行在距离大选还有六个月的时候降低利率，帮助疲弱的经济复苏，福林随之下挫。【原文：The forint sank after Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban’s government raised pressure on the central bank to cut interest rates and help kickstart an ailing economy six months out from elections.】

item.title: 网络攻击后，捷豹路虎将在英国重启生产
item.description: 捷豹路虎汽车公司（Jaguar Land Rover Automotive Plc）的全球生产网络遭到网络攻击，在长达数周的中断后，英国部分生产基地将恢复生产。【原文：Jaguar Land Rover Automotive Plc will resume production at some of its UK sites after weeks-long outages following a cyberattack that snarled its global manufacturing network.】

item.title: 博茨瓦纳称取消钻石拍卖并非 "紧急 "拍卖
item.description: 博茨瓦纳表示，上月底举行的史无前例的临时钻石拍卖会并不是 "紧急拍卖"，因为没有达到底价，所以没有卖出任何宝石。【原文：Botswana said an unprecedented ad-hoc diamond auction late last month — in which it didn’t sell any gems because the reserve price wasn’t met — wasn’t an “emergency sale.”】

item.title: 对冲基金和加密货币吸引海湾继承人继承 1 万亿美元遗产
item.description: 2020 年，一个拥有 135 年历史的海湾商人家族的两个年轻兄弟向家族中的一位资金管理人提出了一个想法：在比特币上下注。【原文：In 2020, two young brothers at a 135-year-old Gulf merchant family approached one of its money-managers with an idea: bet on Bitcoin.】

item.title: 印度开始实时外汇结算，吸引投资者前往印度中心
item.description: 印度在古吉拉特邦国际金融科技城引入了实时外汇结算业务，此举旨在使这个旗舰国际金融中心对全球投资者更具吸引力。【原文：India has introduced real-time foreign exchange settlement operations at the Gujarat International Finance Tec-City, a move aimed at making the flagship international financial hub more attractive to global investors.】

item.title: B&M 盈利预警后暴跌，新任首席执行官公布改革计划
item.description: B&M European Value Retail SA 在这家英国折扣零售商发布利润预警并表示可能需要长达 18 个月的时间来修复公司的所有 "运营弱点 "后暴跌。【原文：B&M European Value Retail SA plummeted after the UK discount retailer warned on profit and said it may take as long as 18 months to fix all the company’s “operational weaknesses.”】

item.title: 西班牙电信公司在首席执行官的审查下寻求更精简、更大胆的结构
item.description: Telefonica SA 董事长正在进行的战略审查将于下个月提交，其目标是启动西班牙电信运营商的增长。【原文：An executive shake-up, potential job cuts and a pledge to do more deals all offer glimpses into the Telefonica SA chairman’s ongoing strategic review, set to be presented next month with the ambition of kick starting growth at the Spanish carrier.】

item.title: 降息预期减弱，马来西亚债券流出量创 11 个月新高
item.description: 受降息预期减弱和债券到期潮的影响，马来西亚债券出现了 11 个月来最大的外资流出。【原文：Malaysian bonds posted their largest foreign outflows in 11 months, weighed down by fading expectations of interest-rate cuts and a wall of maturities.】

item.title: 帝国集团计划回购 14.5 亿英镑，新任首席执行官上任
item.description: 帝国品牌公司（Imperial Brands Plc）计划回购 14.5 亿英镑（19 亿美元）股票，并表示有望实现全年目标。【原文：Imperial Brands Plc plans a £1.45 billion ($1.9 billion) share buyback and said it is on track to meet its full-year targets.】

item.title: 安哥拉政府官员称安哥拉将继续出售欧洲债券
item.description: 安哥拉一位政府官员说，安哥拉将继续发行欧元债券，并将于周二晚些时候宣布出售事宜。【原文：Angola will proceed with a eurobond offering, with an announcement on the sale to be made later on Tuesday, a government official said.】

item.title: 澳大利亚小麦喜获丰收，干燥天气使收成大打折扣
item.description: 澳大利亚的干旱使小麦大丰收的优势荡然无存，世界上最大的出口国之一的供应量也随之减少。【原文：A dry spell in Australia is taking the edge off of a bumper wheat harvest, trimming supplies from one of the world’s largest exporters.】

item.title: 泰国投入 14 亿美元刺激消费
item.description: 阿努廷-查维拉库（Anutin Charnvirakul）总理领导的政府已经批准了一项价值 13.6 亿美元的消费刺激计划，以在大选前提振疲软的经济和政府的声望。【原文：Prime Minister Anutin Charnvirakul’s government has green-lit a $1.36 billion consumption stimulus program to boost a weakening economy and its popularity ahead of a general election.】

item.title: 陷入困境的印尼航空公司将向国家基金申请 14 亿美元资金
item.description: 印尼鹰航空公司（PT Garuda Indonesia）预计将从国家主权财富基金筹集多达 14.4 亿美元的现金，以使这家陷入困境的国有航空公司在财务上站稳脚跟。【原文：PT Garuda Indonesia expects to raise as much as $1.44 billion in cash from the nation’s sovereign wealth fund to put the distressed state-owned carrier on firmer financial footing.】

item.title: 哈利法克斯称英国房价自五月以来首次下跌
item.description: 据英国一家顶级抵押贷款机构称，9 月份英国房价从历史最高点回落，这表明对加税的担忧抑制了潜在购房者的需求。【原文：UK house prices fell from an all-time high in September, according to one of the country’s top mortgage lenders, suggesting fears of tax rises are dampening demand from prospective homebuyers.】

item.title: 德国工厂订单下降，挑战默茨的复苏之路
item.description: 德国工厂订单连续第四个月意外下降，这是政府在努力使欧洲最大经济体摆脱两年萎缩之际遭遇的又一挫折。【原文：German factory orders unexpectedly fell for a fourth month, another setback to the government as it struggles to lift Europe’s biggest economy out of two years of contraction.】

item.title: 英国板球明星参与印度医疗旅游公司融资回合
item.description: 包括英格兰国家队队长本-斯托克斯（Ben Stokes）和快速投球手约弗拉-阿切尔（Jofra Archer）在内的板球明星参与了一家初创公司价值 450 万美元的种子轮融资，该公司致力于帮助英国人在印度获得医疗服务。【原文：Cricket stars including England’s Test captain Ben Stokes and fast bowler Jofra Archer were among participants in a $4.5 million seed funding round for a startup that helps people in the UK get medical treatment in India.】

item.title: 乌兹别克斯坦采取紧缩货币政策抑制通货膨胀
item.description: 乌兹别克斯坦中央银行推迟了实现通胀目标的日期，并计划继续收紧货币政策，目的是在经济强劲增长和监管变革的背景下控制物价。【原文：Uzbekistan’s central bank has pushed back the date for reaching its inflation target and plans to keep monetary policy tight, aiming to rein in prices amid robust growth and regulatory changes.】
